message: convore conversations are organised by group and topic, which makes discovering new topics easy I think.
Convore is a combination of a chat room and a forum. It's very similar to a forum where new posts show up in real time.
Reason 1:  persistence;  Reason 2:  I don't have to "hang" in the IRC room; I can sign up for notifications on just topics I want to watch.

It must be said, though, that convore doesn't appear to be scaling that well if recent server responses are anything to go by. And it's not *that* difficult to drop an image URL into an IRC chat session.
convore is such a great place to discuss about tech topics but, IMHO, its UX loses me. too heavy UI, just like twitter's web interface.
Because it doesn't require you to keep a TCP connection established 24/7.
